title: Drawing, "Hebe Pours Wine into Jupiter's Bowl", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light brown laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Juno shown between Jupiter and Hebe, gods at left. Eagle beside Jupiter. Two putti in lower left hand corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hebe Pours Wine into Jupiter's Bowl", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light brown laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3276.
